author: shervin86
body:
Summary of changes to ALCARECO definition:
- two event contents 
  - EcalCalElectron -> existing but updated (light version of AOD + gsfTracksExtra)
  - EcalUncalElectron -> new format (saving all ECAL DIGIs for fast ECAL rerecoes)
- 3 selections defined:
  - Zee -> two electrons
  - ZSC -> 1 electron + 1 SC at highEta
  - Wenu 
- 6 ALCARECO paths: 2 output formats x 3 selections
- 4 ALCARECO streams defined:
  - EcalCalZElectron: running two paths (Zee and ZSC) on DoubleElectron, EcalCalElectron output format
  - EcalCalWElectron: running the Wenu path on SingleElectron, EcalCalElectron output format
  - EcalUncalZElectron: same as EcalCalZElectron, but EcalUncalElectron output format
  - EcalUncalWElectron: same as EcalCalWElectron, but EcalUncalElectron output format
- Addition path defined but stream not running on any PD:
  - EcalRecalElectron: runs over  EcalUcal{Z,W}Electron

Changelog:
- cleaned BuildFile
- separated plugins
- code cleanup and porting to CMSSW_7_4
- new selections defined in python
- new streams defined (see above)
- added few instructions in documentation to test the streams

@ferriff @crovelli @emanueledimarco would like to follow the PR
title: Ecal AlcaReco for Electrons
